t: Amazon.com: Diamond In The Firepit: CDs & Vinyl
s: Brother Firetribe blends aspects of 80's metal,rock,pop and glam in their brand of AOR. I actually enjoyed their first two albums (False Metal 2006 & Heart Full Of Fire 2008) more than Diamond In The Firepit though this is a well written, produced album and easy to listen to as well.
